CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 25, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Water Ballet - Although Billy Rose was not on hand to stage this show, these mermaids and men did all right for themselves at the big splash party at Centre Avenue YMCA last week. Ballet Dancer Mamie Hamilton goes through one of her routines.  Swimming exhibitions were staged by Primo Omogrosso, Joseph Johnson and James Fowler.  Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group, including Mrs. Talbot in center, and Jean Hawkins (Fowler) and Ann Barnett on right, gathered around three girls wearing grass skirt and leis, including Mamie Hamilton in ballet shoes posed en pointe, for "Water Ballet" performance at Centre Avenue YMCA swimming pool
